    • Method Detail

      • enrollFor

        public void enrollFor(java.util.UUID caster,
                      java.util.UUID person,
                      AccessLevel initialAccess)
        Description copied from interface: ChatEnroll
        Create a record for person. If there is not enough capacity, throws a CapacityException. If the record for that person already exist do nothing.

        There are two kinds of enrollment, self enrollment, manager enrollment. Self enrollment means some one is enrolling for themself, some chat permits this kinds of enrollment. Manager enrollment requires the caster to have AccessLevel.MANAGE access, otherwise it will throws a AccessException.

        Specified by:
        enrollFor in interface ChatEnroll
        Parameters:
        caster - the caster of this operation.
        person - the owner of the new create chat.
        initialAccess - the initial access level.

      • deleteFor

        public void deleteFor(java.util.UUID caster,
                      java.util.UUID person)
        Description copied from interface: ChatEnroll
        Remove the record for person. Set the access of that person to AccessLevel.UNDEFINED.

        This method deletes the chat record for the person, so only the person itself can perform this action.

        Specified by:
        deleteFor in interface ChatEnroll
        Parameters:
        caster - the caster of this operation.
        person - the person that is effected by this operation.

        public boolean isAnnouncementFor(java.util.UUID event)
